    • getSetOnUpdate

      protected org.bson.conversions.Bson getSetOnUpdate(Notification entity)
      Description copied from class: AbstractMongoDao
      Function used in updateOne() to set the fields to update. Must be implemented in the child class.
      Specified by:
      getSetOnUpdate in class AbstractMongoDao<Notification>
      Returns:
      the Bson object to use in updateOne(). Must be something like this : Updates.combine( Updates.set("runtime", 99), Updates.addToSet("genres", "Sports"), Updates.currentTimestamp("lastUpdated"));

    • getNotificationListFromUser

      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of all the notifications of the user.
